alert.note: Alert for Saginaw (Michigan) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued March 25 at 8:58PM EDT until March 26 at 10:24AM EDT by NWS Detroit
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Michigan... Cass River At Frankenmuth affecting Saginaw County. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL LATE TOMORROW MORNING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Cass River At Frankenmuth. * WHEN...Until late tomorrow morning. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 7:45 PM EDT Friday the stage was 17.6 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to fall below flood stage late tonight into Saturday morning. - Flood stage is 17.0 feet. - Impact...At 17.0 feet, the river begins to overflow its banks in places, flooding adjacent low lands. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Caution is urged when walking near riverbanks.
